    GHAppInstallation.listRepositories()
    Deprecated.
    This method cannot work on a GHAppInstallation retrieved from GHApp.listInstallations() (for example), except when resorting to unsupported hacks involving setRoot(GitHub) to switch from an application client to an installation client.
